title: "EndoQuest Robotics to install surgical robot system at Brigham and Women’s Hospital"
excerpt: "EndoQuest Robotics announced today that its proprietary surgical robot system will be installed at a major Boston hospital. Houston-based EndoQuest’s endoluminal surgical (ELS) system will be installed at Brigham and Women’s Hospital (BWH) in Boston."
